title: Interference pattern of two glass plates

content.prompt: Two identical glass plates, whose circular surfaces are carefully polished to be very flat, are arranged as shown above. At one side the pieces touch, and a thin rod is placed between them at the other side to form a wedge of air. Monochromatic light shines on the top plate, creating an interference pattern of light and dark regions. Which of the following best describes this pattern?

choices.label: Concentric circles centered on the center of the plates

Concentric circles whose centers are close
to the rod

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
